name: Oven
description: Client is a mother of 5, children aged 1, 4,8,10, and 14. Together with her husband, the family stays in a 2-room rental flat. Husband used to be the sole income earner, with client taking charge of the household chores and caregiving of children. However, he suffered a stroke towards the end of last year and had to stop work. Client has since started her own home baking business, whilst managing the multiple caregiving responsibilities at home, which includes both caring for children and husband. Client's oven broke down recently and she hopes to acquire a new oven to help keep her business running to supplement the household income. Oven will go straight to client to help her generate income to meet the basic needs at home.

contact.org: Touch Community Services - Touch Family Enablement
contact.name: Neo Xiao Hui

passiton.name: Panasonic cubie oven
passiton.description:
Panasonic NU-SC180BYPQ
Can steam and bake. There is some problem with the steam function. But baking cakes and bread is perfectly OK.

name: milk bottles
description: Client and her boyfriend who comes from a low income family and are unable to afford more than 1 milk bottles to feed the newborn. it will be a great help if the couple can receive more milk bottles for their newborn.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Choa Chu Kang
contact.name: Inez Hong

passiton.name: Milk storage bottles and flange
passiton.description: 4 maymom milk storage bottles (160 ml). 1 flange (not sure of size). Used condition.
passiton.location: Bouna Vista, Clementi, Dover, Hong Leong Garden, Pasir Panjang, West Coast

name: Milk
description: Family is a low income family with multiple young children, of which 2 of them are still on milk and diapers. As family is currently facing tight finances and child protection concerns (father also difficulties securing a job due to his health), it has been difficult for the family to get some stable income. Mother is the main caregiver of the young children as they are not in childcare yet. The family would require some milk  support in the mean time as FSC work with them in exploring childcare placement and managing the child protection concerns. It would be helpful if a donor can provide 4-6 tins of 1.8kg Lactogen 3. Please feel free to email me for more information, thank you!

passiton.name: Milk storage bottles and flange
passiton.description: 4 maymom milk storage bottles (160 ml). 1 flange (not sure of size). Used condition.
passiton.location: Bouna Vista, Clementi, Dover, Hong Leong Garden, Pasir Panjang, West Coast

passiton.name: fresh milk
passiton.description: Qty 30 packs of the fresh milk in pasturized packaging. Was flown in from Ho Chi Min in May 2024 when my grand daughter came over for home visit. My grand daughter had been drinking this brand for the last 15 months. Mfg date is 25mar2024 and expiry is 20Sep2024.

name: Geriatric Chair
description:
Clt, 64F and her son 34M are both permanently unfit for work due to their multiple chronic conditions.

Clt needs a chair that she can use to sit at her corridor, so she does not remain inside the house the whole day.

The chair needs to be heavy and able to withstand rain or shine.

passiton.name: Manual Mobile Reclining Geriatric Chair
passiton.description: In good condition. Please arrange transport. https://shop.lifelinecorp.com/products/manual-mobile-recliner-geriatric-chair-with-tray
passiton.location: Ang Mo Kio, Bishan, Braddell, Thomson

name: Mattress
description: Client is pregnant and has a child. Her husband is the sole breadwinner, and income is only able to assist with daily needs. Family will benefit from queen size mattress as their current mattress is in bad condition.

Queen size wooden bed frame (American standard size); gently used queen size Tuft & Needle memory foam mattress; easy-to-fold and maneuver metal box spring/platform with cover.

Foot of bed has some minor knicks/wear and tear, but is still in great condition.

name: Pillow
description:
Elder is 87 year old, has poor mobility and is usually home alone. Her current pillow has become very old and dirty, and we hope to replace a new one for her. If keen, please contact Ms. Lin at 98467229. Thank you very much.

https://www.rainbowcare.com.sg/pillows-positioning-aids/maxcoil-orthopedic-pillow

name: Dressing Table
description:
Client has recently moved into a 2-room flat and uses a motorized wheelchair for travelling. Her daughter has been diagnosed with mental health and she has stopped her ITE studies. 
Client hopes to be blessed with a dressing table (e.g. https://www.fortytwo.sg/baldur-dressing-table.html ) .  
Your generosity can significantly impact their journey toward stability and relief. 
Donor please arrange for the transport of the item. Please WhatsApp Navin @ 8388 7562
